analyzed: zhes pa kho na'o //

analyzed: yid kyi yul de goms par bya //

analyzed: zhes pa'i bar gyis bstan te dkyus na gsal lo //

analyzed: de dbus 'khor lo ni 'khor lo drug tu rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid can no //
translated: In the middle of that, the wheel is the nature of Vajrasattva and so forth, the transcendent ones in the six wheels.

original: de yang dag pa ste /
analyzed: de yang dag pa ste /
translated: That is pure

original: shes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad bskyed do zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: shes pa ni dkyil 'khor gyi gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad bskyed do zhes pa'i don to //
translated: knowledge, meaning that one should generate Vairocana, the principal of the mandala.

original: de yang ji ltar bskyed ce na /
analyzed: de yang ji ltar bskyed ce na /
translated: How is that generated?

original: stong ba'i ngang las chu la chu bur rdol ba'i tshul du pam las seng ge'i khri'i steng du pam las sna tshogs padma las nyi ma /
analyzed: stong ba'i ngang las chu la chu bur rdol ba'i tshul du pam las seng ge'i khri'i steng du pam las sna tshogs padma las nyi ma /
translated: From within emptiness, like a water bubble bursting on water, a lion throne arises from paṃ. Upon that, a multicolored lotus arises from paṃ, and upon that is a sun.

original: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya gang ba lta bu //
analyzed: aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya gang ba lta bu //
translated: From aḥ arises a full moon maṇḍala.

original: de steng rig pa aa dkar por gyur pa las 'khor lo /
analyzed: de steng rig pa aa dkar por gyur pa las 'khor lo /
translated: Upon that, the awareness is a white a. From that, a wheel arises.

original: de yongs su gyur pa las gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad du'o //
analyzed: de yongs su gyur pa las gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad du'o //
translated: That completely transforms into the principal one, Vairocana.

original: de nyid la /
analyzed: de nyid la /
translated: In that very [mandala],

original: padma seng ge'i zla seng du //
analyzed: padma seng ge'i zla seng du //
translated: the lotus, the lion, and the moon

original: a'a: las bskyed pa'i rtag pa pos //
analyzed: a'a: las bskyed pa'i rtag pa pos //
translated: are generated by the syllable aḥ.

original: gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad che //
analyzed: gtso bo rnam par snang mdzad che //
translated: The chief one is the great Vairocana.

original: zhes pa de skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: zhes pa de skad ces bya'o //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: rnam snang de yang ci 'dra zhe na /
analyzed: rnam snang de yang ci 'dra zhe na /
translated: And what is this Vairocana like?

original: rnam thar bzhi ldan kun du zhal //
analyzed: rnam thar bzhi ldan kun du zhal //
translated: He has four doors of liberation and faces every direction.

original: zhes gsungs te //
analyzed: zhes gsungs te //
translated: This is what is being said.

original: @115a * // rnam thar bzhi ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang bzhi'o //
analyzed: @115a * // rnam thar bzhi ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba dang bzhi'o //
translated: The four doors of liberation are emptiness, signlessness, wishlessness, and natural luminosity.

original: ldan pa ni de mda' ba'o //
analyzed: ldan pa ni de mda' ba'o //
translated: To have these is to possess them.

original: kun du zhal ni zhal bzhi ba'o //
analyzed: kun du zhal ni zhal bzhi ba'o //
translated: Facing every direction means having four faces.

original: de yang phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa'i le'u bdun pa nas //
analyzed: de yang phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa'i le'u bdun pa nas //
translated: This is also stated in the Questions of Vajrapāṇi chapter of the Tantra of the Great River of the Inconceivable Secrets of Alikali:

original: phyogs bzhi'i slob dpon mnyes bya'i phyir //
analyzed: phyogs bzhi'i slob dpon mnyes bya'i phyir //
translated: In order to please the masters of the four directions,

original: rnam snang zhal bzhi phyogs bzhir gzigs //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: rnam snang zhal bzhi phyogs bzhir gzigs // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Vairocana looks in the four directions with four faces.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du dha'i: dkar po dha'i: yongs su gyur pa las dang po'i sangs rgyas stobs lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags su zhal lnga pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du dha'i: dkar po dha'i: yongs su gyur pa las dang po'i sangs rgyas stobs lnga dang ldan pa'i rtags su zhal lnga pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, in the heart of Vairocana, from A arises a moon mandala. Upon that, from DHI, white, arises a white DHI. From the complete transformation of that, one should meditate on the primordial buddha with five faces, the sign of possessing the five powers.

original: de ka la rnam snang chen po'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil du yi ge dha'i: dkar po las dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa zhes gsungs pa kho na'o //
analyzed: de ka la rnam snang chen po'i thugs kar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil du yi ge dha'i: dkar po las dang po'i sangs rgyas zhal lnga pa zhes gsungs pa kho na'o //
translated: At that very time, in the heart of Great Vairocana, in the center of a moon mandala, from a white syllable DHI, arises the primordial buddha with five faces.

original: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go sla'o //
translated: The rest is easy to understand.

original: shes rab gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i busti re re bsnams pa'o zhes pa ni //
analyzed: shes rab gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i busti re re bsnams pa'o zhes pa ni //
translated: Each one holds a volume of the Perfection of Wisdom.

original: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung dum bu bzhir bgos te /
analyzed: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gzhung dum bu bzhir bgos te /
translated: The Perfection of Wisdom scripture is divided into four sections.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: gleng gzhi'i dum bu dang / stong pa nyid kyi dum bu dang / rnam dag gi dum bu dang / mtshan dpe'i dum bu dang bzhi rnams so //
analyzed: gleng gzhi'i dum bu dang / stong pa nyid kyi dum bu dang / rnam dag gi dum bu dang / mtshan dpe'i dum bu dang bzhi rnams so //
translated: The introductory section, the emptiness section, the purity section, and the section on the major and minor marks.

original: de yang autpa la re'i steng na'o //
analyzed: de yang autpa la re'i steng na'o //
translated: Moreover, it is on top of each utpala flower.🔽Meditate on the wisdom wheel at his heart.

original: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo bsgom ste ji skad du //
analyzed: de'i thugs kar shes rab 'khor lo bsgom ste ji skad du //
translated: As it is said:🔽Meditate on the wisdom wheel

original: dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs ka ru //🔽shes rab 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
analyzed: dang po'i sangs rgyas thugs ka ru // shes rab 'khor lo bsgom par bya //
translated: at the heart of the primordial buddha.

original: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa la sogs pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of this and so forth is as follows.

original: rgyu rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi gnyen par sgra'i yi ge bcu gnyis bsgoms pas 'bras bu sa mchog bcu gnyis thob ste /
analyzed: rgyu rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi gnyen par sgra'i yi ge bcu gnyis bsgoms pas 'bras bu sa mchog bcu gnyis thob ste /
translated: By meditating on the twelve syllables of the sounds as the antidote to the twelve links of dependent origination, the result is the attainment of the twelve great grounds.

original: de yang rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las //
analyzed: de yang rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las //
translated: Moreover, in the Vajra Essence Ornament Tantra it is said:

original: kun du 'od kyis chen po nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs te nyi ma dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: kun du 'od kyis chen po nyon mongs pa thams cad bsregs te nyi ma dang 'dra'o //
translated: The great ground of Universal Radiance burns all afflictions like the sun.

original: gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od dug la rtsi gtong ba dang 'dra ste /
analyzed: gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od dug la rtsi gtong ba dang 'dra ste /
translated: The second ground, Nectar Radiance, is like applying medicine to poison.

original: zla ba'i 'od gsal ba dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: zla ba'i 'od gsal ba dang 'dra'o //
translated: It is like the clear light of the moon.

original: sa gsum pa ste nam mkha'i 'od ni chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' bzhin du so sor snang ba'o //
analyzed: sa gsum pa ste nam mkha'i 'od ni chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' bzhin du so sor snang ba'o //
translated: The third ground, Space Radiance, is the individual appearance of the space-like dharmadhatu.

original: sa bzhi pa rdo rje'i 'od de yid bde ba ste ;
analyzed: sa bzhi pa rdo rje'i 'od de yid bde ba ste ;
translated: The fourth ground, Vajra Radiance, is mental satisfaction.

original: bde ba stong pa dbyer med pa'o //
analyzed: bde ba stong pa dbyer med pa'o //
translated: Bliss and emptiness are inseparable.

original: sa lnga pa ni rin po che'i 'od de yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste dgos pa thams cad skong bar dbang bskur ba'o //
analyzed: sa lnga pa ni rin po che'i 'od de yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang 'dra ste dgos pa thams cad skong bar dbang bskur ba'o //
translated: The fifth stage is the stage of the precious light, which is like a wish-fulfilling gem, and is the consecration of the fulfillment of all needs.

original: sa drug pa ste padma'i 'od de 'dod chags dang mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms pa'o //
analyzed: sa drug pa ste padma'i 'od de 'dod chags dang mtshan ma'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad 'joms pa'o //
translated: The sixth stage is the stage of the lotus light, which is the destruction of all conceptual thoughts of desire and signs.

original: sa bdun pa las kyi 'od de sangs rgyas @115b kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: sa bdun pa las kyi 'od de sangs rgyas @115b kyi phrin las thams cad rdzogs pa'o //
translated: The seventh stage is the stage of the light of action, which is the completion of all the activities of the buddhas.

original: sa brgyad pa dpe med pa ste dpe las 'das pa dpe ru yod pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: sa brgyad pa dpe med pa ste dpe las 'das pa dpe ru yod pa ma yin pa'o //
translated: The eighth stage is the stage of the incomparable, which is beyond all examples and does not exist as an example.

original: sa dgu pa dpe dang ldan te /
analyzed: sa dgu pa dpe dang ldan te /
translated: The ninth stage is the stage of the example.

original: thams cad so sor 'bigs ba'o //
analyzed: thams cad so sor 'bigs ba'o //
translated: It is the individual penetration of all.

original: sa bcu pa ni shes rab kyi 'od ces bya ste /
analyzed: sa bcu pa ni shes rab kyi 'od ces bya ste /
translated: The tenth stage is called the stage of the light of wisdom.

original: shes rab kyis ni don thams cad 'byed pa'o //
analyzed: shes rab kyis ni don thams cad 'byed pa'o //
translated: It is the discernment of all meanings by means of wisdom.

original: sa bcu gcig pa ni bla na med pa'i sa rab tu 'od gsal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
analyzed: sa bcu gcig pa ni bla na med pa'i sa rab tu 'od gsal ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do //
translated: The eleventh stage is the stage of the unsurpassed light, which is the omniscience of all.

original: sa bcu gnyis pa ni rnal 'byor gyi ye shes rab tu so sor rig pa rdzogs pa'o zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: sa bcu gnyis pa ni rnal 'byor gyi ye shes rab tu so sor rig pa rdzogs pa'o zhes gsungs so //
translated: The twelfth stage is the perfection of the intuition of yoga.

original: de ltar rgyu 'bras kyi don bshad nas //
analyzed: de ltar rgyu 'bras kyi don bshad nas //
translated: Thus, having explained the meaning of cause and effect,

original: da ni 'khor lo bsgom pa'i thabs bshad de //
analyzed: da ni 'khor lo bsgom pa'i thabs bshad de //
translated: now the method of meditation on the wheel is explained.

original: don byas slar 'dus zhes pa la sogs pa dkyus nyid na gsal lo //
analyzed: don byas slar 'dus zhes pa la sogs pa dkyus nyid na gsal lo //
translated: The meaning of having performed the purpose, they gather back and so forth is clear in the text itself.

original: sa mchog bcu gnyis rdzogs rtags su //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: sa mchog bcu gnyis rdzogs rtags su // zhes pa ni /
translated: The sign of perfection of the twelve supreme stages🔽is the placement of the twelve vowels and consonants.

original: sa mchog bcu gnyis ni gong du gsungs pa'o //
analyzed: sa mchog bcu gnyis ni gong du gsungs pa'o //
translated: The twelve supreme stages are as stated above.

original: sgra yig bcu gnyis dgod par bya //
analyzed: sgra yig bcu gnyis dgod par bya //
translated: The twelve vowels and consonants are to be placed.🔽This is what will come below:🔽a ā

original: zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba 'di yin te /
analyzed: zhes pa ni 'og nas 'byung ba 'di yin te /
translated: i ī🔽u ū🔽e ai🔽o au

original: aa a'a / ai a'i /🔽au a'u / ae aee /🔽ao aoo / aam aa: zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: aa a'a / ai a'i / au a'u / ae aee / ao aoo / aam aa: zhes gsungs te /
translated: A ā / i ī /🔽u ū / e ai /🔽o au / aṃ aḥ.🔽🔽

original: de'i don ni 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud phyi ma las gsal bar gsungs te de la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i don ni 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud phyi ma las gsal bar gsungs te de la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: The meaning of that is clearly stated in the Later Tantra of the Magical Net of Manjushri, and one should enter into that.

original: 'jam dpal 'di ni dpal gyi sku //
analyzed: 'jam dpal 'di ni dpal gyi sku //
translated: Manjushri, this is the glorious body,

original: thun mong ma yin gnyis med khyab pa'i chos //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin gnyis med khyab pa'i chos //
translated: the uncommon, nondual, pervasive Dharma,

original: dus gsum btang snyoms rgyal ba kun gyi yab //
analyzed: dus gsum btang snyoms rgyal ba kun gyi yab //
translated: the impartial one of the three times, the father of all victors.

original: chos dbyings yum nyid sems dpa' sras mchog ston //🔽blo dang ldan pa gang zhig mdo 'di ni //
analyzed: chos dbyings yum nyid sems dpa' sras mchog ston // blo dang ldan pa gang zhig mdo 'di ni //
translated: The dharmadhatu is the mother, the supreme son is Manjushri.🔽The wise who wish to see this sutra

original: mngon sum tshad mar bzhag nas mthong 'dod pa //
analyzed: mngon sum tshad mar bzhag nas mthong 'dod pa //
translated: As a valid cognition of direct perception🔽Should understand the meaning of the wheel of syllables

original: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i 'khor lo'i tshul bzhin du //
analyzed: sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i 'khor lo'i tshul bzhin du //
translated: In accordance with the wheel of the net of illusion.

original: yi ge 'khor lo'i don gyis 'jam dpal lo /
analyzed: yi ge 'khor lo'i don gyis 'jam dpal lo /
translated: The meaning of the wheel of syllables is Manjushri.

original: gdod nas dag cing skye ba med pa yi //
analyzed: gdod nas dag cing skye ba med pa yi //
translated: The primordial purity, unborn

original: aa a'a zhes pa 'dus ma byas pa'i chos //
analyzed: aa a'a zhes pa 'dus ma byas pa'i chos //
translated: A a are the unconditioned phenomena.

original: rgyu nyid med pas 'bras bu mi tshol phyir //
analyzed: rgyu nyid med pas 'bras bu mi tshol phyir //
translated: Since there is no cause, there is no result to seek.

original: aa ltar mnyam gzhag chos kyi sku nyid de //
analyzed: aa ltar mnyam gzhag chos kyi sku nyid de //
translated: Like a, the dharmakaya of equipoise

original: don dam dbyings nyid mkha' 'dra dmigs med khyab //
analyzed: don dam dbyings nyid mkha' 'dra dmigs med khyab //
translated: Is the ultimate expanse, like space, nonconceptual, and all-pervading.

original: 'byung ba rang bzhin med par gnas pa las //
analyzed: 'byung ba rang bzhin med par gnas pa las //
translated: From the elements abiding without inherent nature,

original: 'jam dpal ral gris btab nas gcod pa ltar //
analyzed: 'jam dpal ral gris btab nas gcod pa ltar //
translated: Like cutting with a Manjushri sword,

original: aa yi gu gu thugs rje rang nis 'phyo //
analyzed: aa yi gu gu thugs rje rang nis 'phyo //
translated: A a is the natural expression of compassion.

original: ai a'i zhes pa chos ki yum nyid lam //
analyzed: ai a'i zhes pa chos ki yum nyid lam //
translated: I i are the path of the mother of the dharma.

original: shes rab pha rol phyin pa bsam pa'i dbyings //
analyzed: shes rab pha rol phyin pa bsam pa'i dbyings //
translated: The perfection of wisdom is the space of thought.

original: lha dang mi la blang dor med tshul gyis //
analyzed: lha dang mi la blang dor med tshul gyis //
translated: In the way of not adopting or rejecting for gods and humans,

original: thun mong ma yin stong nas kun du bzang //
analyzed: thun mong ma yin stong nas kun du bzang //
translated: Uncommon, it arises from emptiness, Samantabhadra.

original: med pa'i ngang nyid med las 'byung ba yi //🔽au a'u zhes pa med pa'i snying po 'byung //
analyzed: med pa'i ngang nyid med las 'byung ba yi // au a'u zhes pa med pa'i snying po 'byung //
translated: The essence of nonexistence arises from the state of nonexistence,🔽au and āu.

original: ye shes chen po yod med mtha' las 'das //
analyzed: ye shes chen po yod med mtha' las 'das //
translated: Great pristine consciousness is beyond the extremes of existence and nonexistence.

original: @116a * // che ba'i ngang gis 'gro kun dge la sbyor //🔽gnyis dang gnyis med gtan nas brjod bral ba'i //
analyzed: @116a * // che ba'i ngang gis 'gro kun dge la sbyor // gnyis dang gnyis med gtan nas brjod bral ba'i //
translated: By nature great, it connects all migrating beings to virtue.🔽The nature of the triangle, e, is unchanging,

original: gru gsum ae yi rang bzhin nyid mi g-yo //
analyzed: gru gsum ae yi rang bzhin nyid mi g-yo //
translated: utterly free from the expressions of duality and nonduality.

original: ae aee zhes pa tha snyad bsam brjod bral //
analyzed: ae aee zhes pa tha snyad bsam brjod bral //
translated: E and ai are free from conventions and thought.

original: sems dang sems ni 'jam dpal ting 'dzin to //
analyzed: sems dang sems ni 'jam dpal ting 'dzin to //
translated: The mind and the mind are Mañjuśrī’s samādhi.

original: thabs dang shes rab sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshogs //
analyzed: thabs dang shes rab sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i tshogs //
translated: The assembly of the net of illusions of method and wisdom

original: ao aoo zhes pa 'du 'phro 'khrug med cing //
analyzed: ao aoo zhes pa 'du 'phro 'khrug med cing //
translated: is oṃ and āḥ, free from the commotion of gathering and dispersing.

original: 'ja' tshon rnam par so sor yid bzhin sbyor //🔽'jam dpal rnam par rol pa'i bde ba che //
analyzed: 'ja' tshon rnam par so sor yid bzhin sbyor // 'jam dpal rnam par rol pa'i bde ba che //
translated: The rainbow is individually applied according to one’s wish.🔽The great bliss of Mañjuśrī’s display

original: rnal 'byor chen po ye shes 'byor ba'i dpal //
analyzed: rnal 'byor chen po ye shes 'byor ba'i dpal //
translated: is the glory of the wealth of the pristine consciousness of the great yoga.

original: nam mkha' mi dmigs aam ste ye shes brjod //
analyzed: nam mkha' mi dmigs aam ste ye shes brjod //
translated: Space is not observed, aṃ, the expression of pristine consciousness.

original: ye shes ma 'dres aa yig dbyings su 'dres //
analyzed: ye shes ma 'dres aa yig dbyings su 'dres //
translated: The pristine wisdoms are distinct, but the letter A is merged in basic space.

original: stong nyid ci la'ang ma reg lhun gyis grub //
analyzed: stong nyid ci la'ang ma reg lhun gyis grub //
translated: Emptiness does not touch anything, and so is spontaneously present.

original: don kun 'byor pas blang dor med pa yi //
analyzed: don kun 'byor pas blang dor med pa yi //
translated: Since all goals are accomplished, there is no acceptance or rejection.

original: bdag nyid rang bzhin gzhan dang mnyam pas na //
analyzed: bdag nyid rang bzhin gzhan dang mnyam pas na //
translated: Since one’s nature is the same as that of others,

original: bsam gyis mi khyab mi gnas mi sems na //
analyzed: bsam gyis mi khyab mi gnas mi sems na //
translated: If one is inconceivable, nonabiding, and nonconceptual,

original: 'jam dpal nyid dang yon tan rdzogs par mnyam //🔽zhes gsungs te /
analyzed: 'jam dpal nyid dang yon tan rdzogs par mnyam // zhes gsungs te /
translated: One is equal to Mañjuśrī in perfect qualities.

original: aa ni gdod ma nas skye ba med cing 'dus ma byas pa /
analyzed: aa ni gdod ma nas skye ba med cing 'dus ma byas pa /
translated: A is unproduced from the beginning and uncompounded.

original: rgyus ma bsgrubs pa'i phyir 'bras bu btsal du med pas gdod ma nas chos nyid bde ba chen po'o //
analyzed: rgyus ma bsgrubs pa'i phyir 'bras bu btsal du med pas gdod ma nas chos nyid bde ba chen po'o //
translated: Since it is not established by causes, it is not a result to be sought, and so is primordially the nature of phenomena, great bliss.

original: ai ni de nyid nam mkha' ltar mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab chen pos de ltar gcod cing mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'phro bas shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
analyzed: ai ni de nyid nam mkha' ltar mi dmigs pa'i phyir shes rab chen pos de ltar gcod cing mi dmigs pa'i thugs rje chen po 'phro bas shes rab kyi rang bzhin no //
translated: I is the nature of wisdom, since that is itself unobservable like space, and the great compassion of nonobservation radiates out by cutting through in that way with great wisdom.

original: au ni de lta bas na kun du bzang po byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te /
analyzed: au ni de lta bas na kun du bzang po byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin te /
translated: U is the nature of bodhicitta, wholly positive, since that is so.

original: mtshan ma ldang ba la mi dor //
analyzed: mtshan ma ldang ba la mi dor //
translated: One does not reject the arising of signs.

original: mi ldang ba la mi gnas kun du bzang po'i mtha' las 'das pa chen po'o //
analyzed: mi ldang ba la mi gnas kun du bzang po'i mtha' las 'das pa chen po'o //
translated: It is not a non-arising, but rather a great transcendence of the limits of the pure.

original: ngang gis 'gro ba kun kyang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin la sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: ngang gis 'gro ba kun kyang bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin la sbyor ba'o //
translated: It is the natural going of all things, which is the union with the nature of great bliss.

translated: The great seal is to visualize oneself in the form of any deity and to purify one’s nature in accordance with the drawing.

original: de ltar phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa de la yang dag pa'i don bsgrub pas na /
analyzed: de ltar phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab pa de la yang dag pa'i don bsgrub pas na /
translated: Since one accomplishes the meaning of reality by means of those four seals,

original: bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog 'grub //🔽ces gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: bzhi yis rgyas gdab don mchog 'grub // ces gsungs pa yin no //
translated: the four seals accomplish the supreme meaning.

original: de yang mdo las /
analyzed: de yang mdo las /
translated: The sutra says:

original: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
analyzed: rdo rje rnon po ral gri che //
translated: The vajra is sharp, the sword is great,

original: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag //
analyzed: yi ge mchog ste rnam par dag //
translated: the supreme syllable is pure.🔽And:

original: ces ba dang / phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa //🔽zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ces ba dang / phyag rgya bzhi yi don ston pa // zhes gsungs so //
translated: The meaning of the four seals is taught.

original: de nas mchod ba'i bye brag gis /🔽zhes ba ni /
analyzed: de nas mchod ba'i bye brag gis /🔽zhes ba ni /
translated: Then, with the various offerings,

original: mchod rdzas rnams bsangs la byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: mchod rdzas rnams bsangs la byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: Having purified and blessed the offering substances,

original: yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de la mchod pa'i bye brag thams cad kyis mchod do //
analyzed: yongs su rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor de la mchod pa'i bye brag thams cad kyis mchod do //
translated: one should make offerings to that perfect mandala with all the various offerings.

original: de yang gang zhe na /
analyzed: de yang gang zhe na /
translated: What are they?

original: bdag las mi gnyis ba de yis so //
analyzed: bdag las mi gnyis ba de yis so //
translated: One should do so with not two selves.

original: de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i bstod pas kyang bstod do //
analyzed: de nas 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes pa'i bstod pas kyang bstod do //
translated: Then, one should also praise with the praise beginning,

original: mchod nas phyag rgya bzhi bya ba //🔽zhes pa ni /
analyzed: mchod nas phyag rgya bzhi bya ba // zhes pa ni /
translated: Having made offerings, one should perform the four seals.

original: phyag rgya bzhi'i don dang ldan par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhi'i don dang ldan par bya'o zhes pa'i don to //
translated: This means that one should be endowed with the meaning of the four seals.

original: dang po sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o zhes pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: dang po sangs rgyas la sogs pa'i gnas su bya ba'i rim pa'o zhes pa'i don ni 'di yin te /
translated: The meaning of the stages of the rite in the places of the first Buddha and so forth is as follows:

original: aa las 'od byung zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas /
analyzed: aa las 'od byung zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas /
translated: Light arises from a, and a moon maṇḍala is clarified.

original: de las ye shes sems dpa' de las shes rab 'khor lo /
analyzed: de las ye shes sems dpa' de las shes rab 'khor lo /
translated: From that, the gnosis being arises; from that, the wisdom wheel;

original: de las dang po'i sangs rgyas de las gzhi'i sangs rgyas /
analyzed: de las dang po'i sangs rgyas de las gzhi'i sangs rgyas /
translated: from that, the first Buddha; from that, the basic Buddha;

original: de las rdo rje'i sgo drug nas 'thon te /
analyzed: de las rdo rje'i sgo drug nas 'thon te /
translated: From that, the celestial mansion arises from the celestial mansion, the variegated vajra arises from the variegated vajra, the source of phenomena arises from the source of phenomena, the great enlightenment stūpa arises from the great enlightenment stūpa, and from the six vajra doors, light rays emerge.

original: shar phyogs dge ba'i sgo la sogs pa nas 'od zer 'thon te /
analyzed: shar phyogs dge ba'i sgo la sogs pa nas 'od zer 'thon te /
translated: Light rays emerge from the eastern door of virtue, and so on,

original: srid pa gsal bar byas /
analyzed: srid pa gsal bar byas /
translated: illuminating existence.

original: don rnam pa gnyis dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas te /
analyzed: don rnam pa gnyis dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byas te /
translated: After performing the two purposes and the deeds of a buddha,

original: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi thugs kar zhugs /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi thugs kar zhugs /
translated: they enter the hearts of the buddhas of the three times.

original: dpal gyi be'u la bskor ba lan gsum byas /
analyzed: dpal gyi be'u la bskor ba lan gsum byas /
translated: They circle the śrīvatsa three times,

original: shes rab dang ye shes kyi bcud bsdus /
analyzed: shes rab dang ye shes kyi bcud bsdus /
translated: collect the essence of wisdom and gnosis,

original: slar rim gyis bzhi po'i aa la thim ste /
analyzed: slar rim gyis bzhi po'i aa la thim ste /
translated: and then gradually dissolve into the āḥ of the four goddesses.

original: snang stong gnyis med kyi ngo bor rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: snang stong gnyis med kyi ngo bor rtogs par bya'o //
translated: One should realize the essence of the nonduality of appearance and emptiness.

original: de ltar 'phro 'du bya zhing bsgom pa ni bsnyen pa bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'phro 'du bya zhing bsgom pa ni bsnyen pa bsdus pa'o //
translated: Thus, the practice of emanating and gathering in that way is the concise approach.

original: aom sarba dharma aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba bi shu dadha badzra aa a'a aam aa: zhes rtsa ba'i sngags bzla zhing 'phro 'du byed pa ni bsnyen pa 'bring po'o //🔽bsnyen pa rgyas pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang thob pa yin na /
analyzed: aom sarba dharma aa bh'a ba sva bh'a ba bi shu dadha badzra aa a'a aam aa: zhes rtsa ba'i sngags bzla zhing 'phro 'du byed pa ni bsnyen pa 'bring po'o // bsnyen pa rgyas pa ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du dbang thob pa yin na /
translated: Reciting the root mantra, “Oṃ, all phenomena are of the nature of nonexistence, pure, and purified, Oṃ āḥ hūṃ vajra speech vajra mind vajra body Oṃ āḥ hūṃ,” and performing the emanation and reabsorption is the medium approach to familiarization.

original: 'di ltar sangs @121a * //🔽rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs @121a * // rgyas bcom ldan 'das //
translated: The extensive approach to familiarization is as follows: If one has received empowerment into the maṇḍala of the vajra realm,🔽one should recite the fourteen verses,

original: zhes pa nas /
analyzed: zhes pa nas /
translated: from “The bhagavān buddhas”

original: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog / ces pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: theg pa chen po'i tshul gyi mchog / ces pa'i bar du'o //
translated: up to “the supreme method of the Mahāyāna.”

original: tshigs su bcad pa bcu bzhi brjod pas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i aa las yi ge brgyad cu rtsa drug 'phros pas rnam par snang mdzad mang por gyur te /
analyzed: tshigs su bcad pa bcu bzhi brjod pas ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i aa las yi ge brgyad cu rtsa drug 'phros pas rnam par snang mdzad mang por gyur te /
translated: By reciting these fourteen verses, the eighty-six syllables emanate from the a in the heart of the gnosis being.

original: zhing khams thams cad snang zhing mchod gti mug can gyi don byas /
analyzed: zhing khams thams cad snang zhing mchod gti mug can gyi don byas /
translated: They transform into many Vairocanas, who illuminate all realms, make offerings, and benefit those with the delusion affliction.

original: slar gzhi'i lha rnams la thim par bya zhing bklags na ring po mi thogs par chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur te /
analyzed: slar gzhi'i lha rnams la thim par bya zhing bklags na ring po mi thogs par chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur te /
translated: They dissolve back into the basic deities. If one recites this, one will become a king of dharma before long.

original: de ni bsnyen pa rgyas pa'o //
analyzed: de ni bsnyen pa rgyas pa'o //
translated: That is the extensive approach to familiarization.

original: de nas thun gtong bar 'dod na /
analyzed: de nas thun gtong bar 'dod na /
translated: Then, if one wishes to end the session,

original: mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: mchod pa'i yo byad rnams kyis yang dag par mchod la /
translated: one should make offerings with the articles of offering.

original: bdag las mi gnyis pa'i gzugs su rim pa nas rim par 'od zer gyi tshul du 'thon te /
analyzed: bdag las mi gnyis pa'i gzugs su rim pa nas rim par 'od zer gyi tshul du 'thon te /
translated: One should emerge in the form of one’s own body from the form of the deity, in the manner of light rays, and

original: las kyi bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: las kyi bya ba la sogs pa la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: one should engage in the activities of daily life, and so forth.

original: de nas thun gnyis pa la bdag las mi gnyis pa'i gzugs can de sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rdzogs nas /
analyzed: de nas thun gnyis pa la bdag las mi gnyis pa'i gzugs can de sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rdzogs nas /
translated: Then, in the second session, that form of one’s own body, which is not different from the deity, having completed the deeds of the Buddha,

original: 'od zer gyi tshul du rim pa nas rim par gzhi la thim ste /
analyzed: 'od zer gyi tshul du rim pa nas rim par gzhi la thim ste /
translated: dissolves in the manner of light rays, stage by stage, into the basis.

original: de nas ci rigs pa ru mchod bstod byas la don gsum po gang yang rung ba cig la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas ci rigs pa ru mchod bstod byas la don gsum po gang yang rung ba cig la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Then, having made offerings and praises as appropriate, one should engage in any of the three activities.

original: de nas yang gtong bar 'dod na sngon du bstan pa lta bur bya'o //
analyzed: de nas yang gtong bar 'dod na sngon du bstan pa lta bur bya'o //
translated: Then, if one wishes to end the session, one should do as previously explained.

original: de nas thun gsum pa la sngon du bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin byas la /
analyzed: de nas thun gsum pa la sngon du bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin byas la /
translated: Then, in the third session, having done as previously explained,

original: thun tha ma la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor de aom manydzu shr'i badzra mu: zhes mdun gyi nam mkha' la phye nas bzhugs pa de la mchod pa dang bstod pa dang / bshags pa byas la gshegs su gsol /
analyzed: thun tha ma la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor de aom manydzu shr'i badzra mu: zhes mdun gyi nam mkha' la phye nas bzhugs pa de la mchod pa dang bstod pa dang / bshags pa byas la gshegs su gsol /
translated: The practitioner makes offerings and praises, confesses faults, and requests the deities to depart.

original: bskyed pa'i mtshan rnams bdag gi thugs kar bsdus la /
analyzed: bskyed pa'i mtshan rnams bdag gi thugs kar bsdus la /
translated: The signs of creation are gathered into one’s heart.

original: dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal dang ldan par byas te ci bde bar spyod lam bya'o //
analyzed: dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi nga rgyal dang ldan par byas te ci bde bar spyod lam bya'o //
translated: Endowed with the pride of being the primordial buddha, one should conduct oneself as one pleases.

original: rnal 'byor don dang ldan pa yis //
analyzed: rnal 'byor don dang ldan pa yis //
translated: The one who is endowed with the meaning of yoga

original: 'bad nas thun gsum dag gis ni //
analyzed: 'bad nas thun gsum dag gis ni //
translated: should strive in the three sessions

original: lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom pa na //
analyzed: lha yi rnal 'byor bsgom pa na //
translated: to cultivate the deity yoga.

original: nges par chos kyi rgyal po thob //
analyzed: nges par chos kyi rgyal po thob //
translated: One will certainly attain the state of a Dharma king.

original: ces le'u khri drug stong pa las gsungs so //
analyzed: ces le'u khri drug stong pa las gsungs so //
translated: This is taught in the sixteen-thousand-line version of the Perfection of Wisdom Sūtra.

original: mdo nyid las kyang /
analyzed: mdo nyid las kyang /
translated: The sūtra itself says:

original: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //
analyzed: dus gsum sangs rgyas las byed pa //
translated: The one who performs the deeds of the buddhas of the three times

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: is the one who practices the perfection of wisdom.

original: de ltar rnal 'byor pas zla ba gsum mam /
analyzed: de ltar rnal 'byor pas zla ba gsum mam /
translated: In this way, the practitioner should practice for three months,🔽or one month,

original: zla ba gcig gam /
analyzed: zla ba gcig gam /
translated: or one week.

original: 'on te dus rgyun du ma chad par bsgoms na don gyi rtags sam lha'i snang ba gsal ba dang / gzod bsnyen pa'i las la 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'on te dus rgyun du ma chad par bsgoms na don gyi rtags sam lha'i snang ba gsal ba dang / gzod bsnyen pa'i las la 'jug par bya'o //
translated: If one meditates continuously without interruption, then the sign of the meaning or the clear appearance of the deity will occur, and one should begin the approach recitation.

original: de nas snang ba mtha' yas la me tog phog ste /
analyzed: de nas snang ba mtha' yas la me tog phog ste /
translated: Then, having tossed the flower to Amitābha,

original: de'i rnal 'byor byed par 'dod na sngon du bstan pa'i gnas @121b yid dang 'thad pa ru /
analyzed: de'i rnal 'byor byed par 'dod na sngon du bstan pa'i gnas @121b yid dang 'thad pa ru /
translated: if one wishes to perform the yoga of that deity, in a pleasing place as previously explained,

original: yo byad la sogs pa tshul bzhin bshams la /
analyzed: yo byad la sogs pa tshul bzhin bshams la /
translated: one should properly arrange the articles and so on.

original: stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
analyzed: stan bde ba la 'dug ste /
translated: Then, sitting on a comfortable seat,

original: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan chad rdzogs par bya ste /
analyzed: lce lag byin gyis brlab pa nas gzhal yas khang bskyed pa yan chad rdzogs par bya ste /
translated: one should complete the practice from the consecration of the tongue and hands up to the creation of the celestial mansion.

original: gtso bo'i gnas su hr'i: las ni /
analyzed: gtso bo'i gnas su hr'i: las ni /
translated: In the place of the principal figure, from hrīḥ,

original: zhes pa nas /
analyzed: zhes pa nas /
translated: as far as

original: spro dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya //
analyzed: spro dang bsdu ba sngon bzhin bya //
translated: the emanation and gathering as before.

original: zhes pa'i bar gyis sbyor ba dang po rdzogs par byas la gzod dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgoms te /
analyzed: zhes pa'i bar gyis sbyor ba dang po rdzogs par byas la gzod dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgoms te /
translated: Having completed the first yoga, one should meditate on the supreme royal maṇḍala.

original: snang pa mtha' yas kyi thugs ka ru dang po'i sangs rgyas de'i lte ba la rdo rje rnon po de'i thugs kar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge hr'i:/
analyzed: snang pa mtha' yas kyi thugs ka ru dang po'i sangs rgyas de'i lte ba la rdo rje rnon po de'i thugs kar aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du yi ge hr'i:/
translated: At the heart of Amitābha is the primordial buddha, at whose navel is Vajra-tiīkṣṇa. At his heart, an āḥ-marked moon maṇḍala arises from an āḥ.

original: de las 'od 'phros pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas /
analyzed: de las 'od 'phros pas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor snang bar byas /
translated: Light shines from the āḥ, illuminating the moon maṇḍala.

original: rdo rje rnon po snang bar byas /
analyzed: rdo rje rnon po snang bar byas /
translated: Vajra-tiīkṣṇa is illuminated.

original: gtso bo snang ba mtha' yas snang bar byas /
analyzed: gtso bo snang ba mtha' yas snang bar byas /
translated: The principal figure, Amitābha, is illuminated.

original: gdan dang gzhal yas khang snang bar byas /
analyzed: gdan dang gzhal yas khang snang bar byas /
translated: The seat and celestial mansion are illuminated.

original: rdo rje rgya gram snang bar byas /
analyzed: rdo rje rgya gram snang bar byas /
translated: The vajra cross is illuminated.

original: chos 'byung snang bar byas /
analyzed: chos 'byung snang bar byas /
translated: The source of phenomena is illuminated.

original: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten snang bar byas /
analyzed: byang chub chen po'i mchod rten snang bar byas /
translated: The great-awakening stūpa is illuminated.

original: ye shes kyi rdo rje sgo drug nas 'thon nas zhing khams drug snang bar byas /
analyzed: ye shes kyi rdo rje sgo drug nas 'thon nas zhing khams drug snang bar byas /
translated: The vajra of timeless awareness emerges from the six doors and illuminates the six realms.

original: sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas la mchod pa byas /
translated: Offerings are made to the buddhas.

original: sems can gyi don byas /
analyzed: sems can gyi don byas /
translated: The welfare of sentient beings is accomplished.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
translated: The essence of the tathāgatas is gathered.

original: slar rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas rdo rje'i sgo drug nas tshur rim pa rim par hr'i: la thim ste /
analyzed: slar rdo rje la bskor ba lan gsum byas rdo rje'i sgo drug nas tshur rim pa rim par hr'i: la thim ste /
translated: Again, the deities circumambulate the vajra three times and dissolve into the hrīḥ through the six vajra doors.

original: hr'i:'i byin rlabs kyis mtshan gyi yi ge nyis brgya nyi shur gyur te ;
analyzed: hr'i:'i byin rlabs kyis mtshan gyi yi ge nyis brgya nyi shur gyur te ;
translated: Through the blessing of hrīḥ, the syllables of the name become two hundred and twenty.

original: de la yang gong ma ltar spro bsdu byas pas phyag mtshan du gyur to //
analyzed: de la yang gong ma ltar spro bsdu byas pas phyag mtshan du gyur to //
translated: Again, through the emanation and reabsorbing of light rays as before, they become hand implements.

original: de la spro bsdu byas te /
analyzed: de la spro bsdu byas te /
translated: Through the emanation and reabsorbing of light rays,

original: sngags ring brjod pas lha nyis brgya nyi shur gyur te /
analyzed: sngags ring brjod pas lha nyis brgya nyi shur gyur te /
translated: they become two hundred and twenty deities through reciting the long mantra.

original: de yang pho brang gi dbus su bdun 'khor lo brgyad la drug drug lha rnams kyi phyogs bzhi la nga lnga nga lnga shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de yang pho brang gi dbus su bdun 'khor lo brgyad la drug drug lha rnams kyi phyogs bzhi la nga lnga nga lnga shes par bya'o //
translated: Also, in the center of the palace, there are seven; on the eight spokes, there are six; and in the four directions of the deities, there are seventy-five.

original: de yang ye shes lnga'i ngo bo ste ;
analyzed: de yang ye shes lnga'i ngo bo ste ;
translated: Also, they are the essence of the five awarenesses.

original: rigs chung gi dbye bas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / de bzhin du mnyam pa nyid dang / bya ba grub pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang lngar shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rigs chung gi dbye bas so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang me long lta bu'i ye shes dang / de bzhin du mnyam pa nyid dang / bya ba grub pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang lngar shes par bya'o //
translated: Through the divisions of the minor clans, they should be understood as the individually discerning awareness, the mirrorlike awareness, and similarly, the awareness of uniformity, the awareness of successful activities, and the awareness of the dharmadhātu.

original: de nas las rgyal mchog dang / ye shes sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / bsnyen pa 'bring po yan chad mthun no //
analyzed: de nas las rgyal mchog dang / ye shes sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / bsnyen pa 'bring po yan chad mthun no //
translated: Then, the supreme royal action, the accomplishment of the gnosis being, and the medium approximation are the same.

original: bsnyen pa rgyas pa byed na /🔽yang dag bdag med de bzhin nyid //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /

analyzed: thugs dpal gyi be'u la bskor ba lan gsum byas /

analyzed: shes rab dang ye shes bkug nas rim pa nas rim par thim ste /

analyzed: sprul pa'i sku yang thob par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de ltar sbyor ba dang po rdzogs nas dkyil 'khor rgyal mchog bsgom ste /

analyzed: gtso bo byang sems rdo rje'i thugs kar gdan zla ba la sogs pa drug gsal bar byas la /

analyzed: de'i aa las 'od 'phros pas rim pa nas rim par gsal bar byas te /

analyzed: don gnyis byas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bcud bsdus /
translated: Having performed benefit for the two purposes, the essence of the tathāgatas is gathered.

original: slar rim pa nas rim par aa la thim pas /
analyzed: slar rim pa nas rim par aa la thim pas /

analyzed: de la spro pa dang bsdu ba byas nas phyag mtshan du gyur to //

analyzed: de nas yang spro bsdu byas nas sngags ring brjod pas lha lnga bcu rtsa gsum gyi ngo bor gyur to //

analyzed: mi bskyod par bco lnga /
translated: fifteen into Akṣobhya,

analyzed: snang ba mtha' yas su lnga bcu rtsa lnga /

analyzed: gzhi'i sangs rgyas dang thugs ka'i ye shes sems dpa' bdag gi blo yis bsgyur bar shes par bya'o //

analyzed: de ka la shes rab 'khor lo bdun 'gyur gyi gdams ngag ces bya'o //

original: rgyas par klog na sngags kyi tshig brjod pa dang mu khyud dang / 'khor lo kun la 'od byung nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur par spros te /
analyzed: rgyas par klog na sngags kyi tshig brjod pa dang mu khyud dang / 'khor lo kun la 'od byung nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gyur par spros te /
translated: If one reads extensively, then after reciting the mantra words, light rays emerge from all the rims and wheels, and one emanates the great vajra realm mandala.

analyzed: mchod cing bskul la don byas nas slar 'dus te dkyil 'khor chen por rang gi gnas su bzhugs pa'am /

analyzed: mi lcogs na yig 'bru rnams la thim pa'o // sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //

original: zhes pa nas /
analyzed: zhes pa nas /

original: rdo rje lcags kyu zhugs pa che //
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu zhugs pa che //

analyzed: ye shes sems dpa'i thugs ka'i aa las sgra yig brgyad cu rtsa bzhi 'phros pas rnam par snang mdzad mang por gyur te zhing khams thams cad snang zhing mchod /

original: sgra dang ldan pa rnam skyi mchog / ces pa'i bar du tshigs bcad bcu dang rkang pa gcig gis lhag pa brjod pas snga ma bzhin du khro bo spros te /

original: zhe sdang can gtul nas 'khor lo gnyis pa'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang can gtul nas 'khor lo gnyis pa'o //
translated: They tame those with the quality of anger and dissolve into the letters of the second wheel.

analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pas 'dod chags can btul nas 'khor lo gsum pa'o //

translated: from the twenty-four verses beginning with “Ratnaketu” up to the eighty-four mantra syllables arise, and having become Ākāśagarbha, having subdued the miserly, it is the fourth wheel.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba nas /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis rtogs bya ba nas /
translated: From “That which is to be realized by all buddhas” up to

analyzed: don yod grub pas le lo can btul nas slar lnga bar gnas so //

original: 'khor lo drug ni thams cad spyi'o //
analyzed: 'khor lo drug ni thams cad spyi'o //

analyzed: de nas mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i don bsdus pa'am bstod pa'o //

analyzed: gzung dang ldan pas gzhung bzhin du bya pa'i bye brag gzhan na'o //

analyzed: de nas sa sbyang bar bya ste / 'dom gang ngam /

analyzed: sems dpa'i skyil krung du 'dug la /

analyzed: rdo rje dril bu rab tu bskul //

analyzed: cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang //

analyzed: ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi spyan sngar bzhag la //

analyzed: slob mas kyang 'di skad brjod par bya'o // byang chub sems ni bla med pa //

analyzed: rgyal ba'i sras rnams mthong ba dang // de bzhin pha ma bla ma dang // mdza' bo rnams pa sna tshogs rnams //

original: rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
analyzed: rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
translated: In a dream is auspicious.

original: rig sngags dang ni dngos grub thob //
analyzed: rig sngags dang ni dngos grub thob //

original: de bzhin bslab pa 'dzin pa dang // kun dga' rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bab chu rnams dang rgya mtsho dang // ri dang glang po che dag kyang //
analyzed: de bzhin bslab pa 'dzin pa dang // kun dga' rnam pa sna tshogs dang // 'bab chu rnams dang rgya mtsho dang // ri dang glang po che dag kyang //

analyzed: mthong na yang ni bzang bar grags //

original: rgyal po dag ni mthong na shis //
analyzed: rgyal po dag ni mthong na shis //

original: bde gshegs spyod dang mthun pa yi //
analyzed: bde gshegs spyod dang mthun pa yi //
translated: who are in accord with the conduct of the Sugatas.🔽Seeing a sage, a brahman,🔽a wealthy person, a holy being,🔽a cow, a horse, a swan,

original: dga' thub can dang bram ze dang // phyug po skyes bu dam pa dang // ba dang rta dang ngang pa dang // seng ge dang ni ri dgas dang // rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
analyzed: dga' thub can dang bram ze dang // phyug po skyes bu dam pa dang // ba dang rta dang ngang pa dang // seng ge dang ni ri dgas dang // rmi lam du ni mthong na shis //
translated: a lion, a deer,

original: bkra shis pa yi bya rnams //
analyzed: bkra shis pa yi bya rnams //
translated: and various auspicious birds🔽in a dream is auspicious.🔽Seeing gold, treasures,🔽jewels, silver,🔽various kinds of wealth,🔽in brief, various sources,

analyzed: gser dag dang ni gter rnams dang // rin po che dang dngul dag dang // nor ni rnam pa sna tshogs dang // mdor na 'byung khungs rnam pa dang // mtshon cha rnams dang 'bru rnams dang // 'bras bu @131b rnams dang me tog dang /
translated: weapons, grains,🔽fruits, flowers,

original: rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang // kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang // byis pa dang ni gzhon nu ma //
analyzed: rgyan gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang // kha zas dang ni gos rnams dang // byis pa dang ni gzhon nu ma //
translated: children, young women,

original: bud med gzugs ni bzang mo dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na bzang //
analyzed: bud med gzugs ni bzang mo dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na bzang //
translated: beautiful women,🔽or to obtain and touch them,🔽or to be consecrated in a dream,🔽to become a king, to be wealthy,🔽to become a general,

original: yang na thob cing reg smra dang // rmi lam du ni dbang bskur dang // rgyal por 'gyur zhing 'byor pa dang // dmag dpon du ni gyur pa dang // g-yul las rgyal zhing dgra gsod dang // gnyen dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dang // lha rnams kyang ni mthong ba dang //
analyzed: yang na thob cing reg smra dang // rmi lam du ni dbang bskur dang // rgyal por 'gyur zhing 'byor pa dang // dmag dpon du ni gyur pa dang // g-yul las rgyal zhing dgra gsod dang // gnyen dang lhan cig 'grogs pa dang // lha rnams kyang ni mthong ba dang //
translated: to be victorious in battle, to kill enemies,🔽to associate with relatives,🔽to see gods,

original: theg pa dang ni shing rta zhon //
analyzed: theg pa dang ni shing rta zhon //
translated: to ride a vehicle or a chariot,

original: de bzhin ri dang khang thogs 'dzegs //
analyzed: de bzhin ri dang khang thogs 'dzegs //
translated: and likewise to climb mountains and rooftops—

original: ngo mtshar rnam pa sna tshogs dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na dge //
analyzed: ngo mtshar rnam pa sna tshogs dag / rmi lam du ni mthong na dge //
translated: these various kinds of wonders seen in dreams are auspicious.

original: yam shing me la sbyin sreg bya //
analyzed: yam shing me la sbyin sreg bya //
translated: Make fire offerings with kindling.🔽Engage in good deeds, cross water, cross corpses,

original: bya ba bzang po dag la 'jug / chu las brgal zhing ro las brgal //
analyzed: bya ba bzang po dag la 'jug / chu las brgal zhing ro las brgal //
translated: and cross rivers.

original: rkun po dag ni tshar gcod dang // stobs 'gyed pa las rgyal ba dang / gyad stobs rdo bcing 'gying ba dang // rtsed mo sna tshogs rmi ba dang // de bzhin rtsal dang stobs 'gyed dang // bkra shis dag ni thams cad dang // mthong na rab tu dge bar bshad //
analyzed: rkun po dag ni tshar gcod dang // stobs 'gyed pa las rgyal ba dang / gyad stobs rdo bcing 'gying ba dang // rtsed mo sna tshogs rmi ba dang // de bzhin rtsal dang stobs 'gyed dang // bkra shis dag ni thams cad dang // mthong na rab tu dge bar bshad //
translated: The slaying of thieves, the victory in a battle of armies, the binding of a powerful man, the display of various sports, the display of strength and power, all the auspicious things, and seeing what is very virtuous.

original: gsang sngags cho ga nyan pa dang // dga' ston dge ba mthong ba dang / sgrub pa bzang po rtsom pa dang / de la sogs pa'i ltas rnams ni //
analyzed: gsang sngags cho ga nyan pa dang // dga' ston dge ba mthong ba dang / sgrub pa bzang po rtsom pa dang / de la sogs pa'i ltas rnams ni //
translated: Listening to the rites of mantra, seeing virtuous festivals, undertaking excellent practice, and seeing such signs as these,

original: dge ba rnam pa du ma dag / blo yis rnam par dpyad bya zhing //
analyzed: dge ba rnam pa du ma dag / blo yis rnam par dpyad bya zhing //
translated: one should examine with the mind the various kinds of virtuous things.

original: de las bzlog pa spang bar bya //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa spang bar bya //
translated: One should abandon those that are contrary to that.

original: dge ba rnams ni 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: dge ba rnams ni 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: The virtuous ones will be accomplished.

original: mi dge rnams ni mi 'grub po //
analyzed: mi dge rnams ni mi 'grub po //
translated: The non-virtuous ones will not be accomplished.

original: mi dge ba dag shes nas su //
analyzed: mi dge ba dag shes nas su //
translated: Having understood the non-virtuous ones,

original: de dag mkhas pas spang bar bya //
analyzed: de dag mkhas pas spang bar bya //
translated: the wise ones should abandon them.

original: dge ba yi ni ltas rnams ni //
analyzed: dge ba yi ni ltas rnams ni //
translated: The signs of the virtuous ones,

original: rab dang 'bring dang tha ma las /
analyzed: rab dang 'bring dang tha ma las /
translated: from the best, middling, and lowest,

original: gsang sngags dngos grub rnam gsum mo //
analyzed: gsang sngags dngos grub rnam gsum mo //
translated: The accomplishments of the secret mantra are of three kinds.

original: mi dge ba la zhi ba yi //
analyzed: mi dge ba la zhi ba yi //
translated: For the non-virtuous, there is the pacifying

original: sbyin sreg zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
analyzed: sbyin sreg zhi ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
translated: fire offering with the mantra of pacification.

original: ba yi mar la brgya rtsa brgyad //🔽cho ga bzhin du zhi ba dang / de nas slob ma sdig bral zhing //
analyzed: ba yi mar la brgya rtsa brgyad // cho ga bzhin du zhi ba dang / de nas slob ma sdig bral zhing //
translated: One hundred and eight times,🔽according to the rite, one should pacify.🔽Then, for those disciples who are free from sin

original: rnam par dag pa de dag la //
analyzed: rnam par dag pa de dag la //
translated: and are pure,

original: rjes su brtse bar bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: rjes su brtse bar bya ba'i phyir //
translated: in order to show compassion,

original: ci 'dod par ni gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: ci 'dod par ni gzung bar bya'o //
translated: one should take up whatever is desired.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa ji ltar bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor yang dag par mchod la bzlas brjod dang bsgom pa ji ltar bzhin du bya'o //
translated: Then, having made offerings to the maṇḍala, one should recite the mantra and meditate as is proper.

original: de nas bdug spos gtul la /
analyzed: de nas bdug spos gtul la /
translated: Then, having burned incense,

original: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams //🔽sras bcas 'jig rten rnam grangs dang // rdo rje rigs chen rigs dag dang // de bzhin padma las kyi rigs //
analyzed: phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams // sras bcas 'jig rten rnam grangs dang // rdo rje rigs chen rigs dag dang // de bzhin padma las kyi rigs //
translated: the buddhas residing in the ten directions,🔽together with their heirs, the enumerations of the world,🔽the great vajra family, the pure families,

original: snying po sngags dang rigs rnams @132a * //
analyzed: snying po sngags dang rigs rnams @132a * //
translated: and likewise the lotus and action families,

original: dang // gang yang lha yi tshogs rnams kun //
analyzed: dang // gang yang lha yi tshogs rnams kun //
translated: all the hosts of gods,

original: chos kyi dbyings na nges bzhugs pa //
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings na nges bzhugs pa //
translated: who are definitely abiding in the realm of phenomena,

original: de rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: de rnams bdag la dgongs su gsol //
translated: All of you, please pay attention to me!

original: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
analyzed: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
translated: In order to have compassion for the disciples and to worship you all,

original: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
analyzed: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
translated: I, named so-and-so,

original: yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni //
analyzed: yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni //
translated: with whatever materials I have,

original: chos dbyings rang bzhin grong khyer mchog / dkyil 'khor sang ni bri bar bgyi //
analyzed: chos dbyings rang bzhin grong khyer mchog / dkyil 'khor sang ni bri bar bgyi //
translated: will draw the mandala of the supreme city, the nature of the realm of reality.

original: thugs brtse nye bar bzhag nas ni //
analyzed: thugs brtse nye bar bzhag nas ni //
translated: Please, with compassion,

original: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: byin gyis brlab pa mdzad du gsol //
translated: grant your blessings!

original: de nas rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'khor lo bteg la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi sngags dang phyag rgya dag gis 'khor lo bteg la /
translated: Then, with one's mantra and mudra, lift up the wheel.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams nyid dang ba'i shel lta bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du zhugs par kha sbyar ba ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams nyid dang ba'i shel lta bu'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du zhugs par kha sbyar ba ni 'di yin te /
translated: The union of the tathagatas themselves entering the crystal mansion is as follows.

original: aom h'um hr'am hr'i: zhes bya ba'i dbus su steng dang 'og dang bar du bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir //
analyzed: aom h'um hr'am hr'i: zhes bya ba'i dbus su steng dang 'og dang bar du bkra shis par bya ba'i phyir //
translated: In the center, above, below, and in between, for the sake of auspiciousness,

original: aom lnga dang / yang steng du a'a: lnga dang / 'og tu h'um lnga bsams te /
analyzed: aom lnga dang / yang steng du a'a: lnga dang / 'og tu h'um lnga bsams te /
translated: one should visualize the five oṃs, and above, the five āḥs, and below, the five hūṃs.

original: de ltar bdag dang dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar bdag dang dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya'o //
translated: In this way, one should meditate on oneself and the maṇḍala.

original: de nas de nyid du slob ma'i gtso bo dang lhan cig bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pa'i blo dang nyal bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de nyid du slob ma'i gtso bo dang lhan cig bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhag pa'i blo dang nyal bar bya'o //
translated: Then, right there, one should sleep together with the chief disciple, with a mind equipoised in concentration.

original: de yan chad ni slob ma lhag phar gnas pa'i rim pa'o //
analyzed: de yan chad ni slob ma lhag phar gnas pa'i rim pa'o //
translated: Up to this point is the procedure for the consecration of the disciple.

original: de nas nang par skya rengs shar tsam na khrus bya ba sngon du 'gro ba nas lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
analyzed: de nas nang par skya rengs shar tsam na khrus bya ba sngon du 'gro ba nas lha'i rnal 'byor byas la /
translated: Then, at dawn, having performed the preliminary ablutions, and so on, one should perform the deity yoga.

original: nyi ma shar kar thig gdab pa brtsam par bya ste /
analyzed: nyi ma shar kar thig gdab pa brtsam par bya ste /
translated: At sunrise, one should begin the layout of the maṇḍala.

original: 'khor los sgyur ba'i nga rgyal bya la srad bu sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar po dang dri zhim pos kha bsgyur la go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag la /
analyzed: 'khor los sgyur ba'i nga rgyal bya la srad bu sngon po dang ser po dang dmar po dang ljang gu dang dkar po dang dri zhim pos kha bsgyur la go rims 'di nyid kyis bzhag la /
translated: Having performed the pride of being a universal monarch, one should arrange the threads—blue, yellow, red, green, and white—having dyed them with fragrant substances, in this very order.

original: h'um hr'am hr'i: aa: aom zhes bya ba'i sa bon las mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la bkod de /
analyzed: h'um hr'am hr'i: aa: aom zhes bya ba'i sa bon las mi bskyod pa la sogs pa srad bu la bkod de /
translated: Having arranged Akṣobhya, and so on, on the threads with the seed syllables hūṃ, hrīḥ, hrīḥ, āḥ, and oṃ,

original: sa bon de rnams la rang rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kar rang rang gi kha dog ji ltar 'od kyi srad bur bsams la mig gnyis su aom d'ipta drisht'a aam ku shi dza: zhes bkod la rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar
analyzed: sa bon de rnams la rang rang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs kar rang rang gi kha dog ji ltar 'od kyi srad bur bsams la mig gnyis su aom d'ipta drisht'a aam ku shi dza: zhes bkod la rab tu g-yo zhing 'bar
translated: Imagine that the tathāgatas residing in their respective directions are at the heart of each of those seeds, and imagine that their respective colors are the threads of light.

original: ba'i rdzi ma'i lcags kyus drang bar bsam /
analyzed: ba'i rdzi ma'i lcags kyus drang bar bsam /
translated: Place oṃ dīpta-dṛṣṭi-aṅkuśi jaḥ in the two eyes and imagine that the eyes are drawn by the hook of the extremely trembling and blazing eyelashes.

original: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab pa'i phyir rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig ces bskul bar bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor chen po'i thig gdab pa'i phyir rdo rje'i thig bdag la stsol cig ces bskul bar bya'o //
translated: One should exhort, “Please grant me the vajra line for the sake of laying out the lines of the maṇḍala of the Bhagavān.”

original: bdag po rnams kyis btang ba'i 'od zer gyis rang rang gi srad bur gang bar bsam mo //🔽aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dha rm'a: spha ra spha ra aa nu pra bishta sarba dha rm'a:/
analyzed: bdag po rnams kyis btang ba'i 'od zer gyis rang rang gi srad bur gang bar bsam mo // aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarba dha rm'a: spha ra spha ra aa nu pra bishta sarba dha rm'a:/
translated: The light rays emitted by the lords fill up their respective threads.🔽anyonyānanugataḥ sarva-dharmāḥ /🔽spharaṇa-spharaṇa-anupravistaḥ sarva-dharmāḥ /

original: aa tyanta aa nu pra @132b bishta sarba dharm'a:/
analyzed: aa tyanta aa nu pra @132b bishta sarba dharm'a:/
translated: atyanta-anupravistaḥ sarva-dharmāḥ /

original: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bsam mo //
analyzed: aom badzra satva h'um zhes zlos shing bsgril bar bsam mo //
translated: Recite oṃ vajrasattva hūṃ and imagine that the thread is wound up.

original: de nas ma dang ta las nyi ma dang zla ba ser po snang ba mig gnyis su bskyed la /
analyzed: de nas ma dang ta las nyi ma dang zla ba ser po snang ba mig gnyis su bskyed la /
translated: Then, from ma and ta, yellow sun and moon are generated in the two eyes.

original: badzra tishtha ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas nas /
analyzed: badzra tishtha ma ta zhes bya bas brtan par byas nas /
translated: With vajra-tistha mat, one stabilizes them.

original: gser la sogs pa'i snod du srad bu bzhag dri dang me tog pa sogs pas mchod la /
analyzed: gser la sogs pa'i snod du srad bu bzhag dri dang me tog pa sogs pas mchod la /
translated: Having placed the thread in a vessel of gold, etc., and having made offerings with perfume, flowers, and so forth,

original: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes bya ba'i rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas par bya'o //
translated: one should recite the mantra oṃ vajra-samaya-sūtra-mantra-krama hūṃ, holding it with the vajra-bond, one hundred and eight times.

original: ring thung ni dkyil 'khor gyi nyis ldab bo //
analyzed: ring thung ni dkyil 'khor gyi nyis ldab bo //
translated: The length is double the maṇḍala.

original: phra sbom ni sgo'i nyi shu cha'o //
analyzed: phra sbom ni sgo'i nyi shu cha'o //
translated: The thickness is one-twentieth of the door.

original: de nas dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya ste /
translated: Then one should lay out the lines of the maṇḍala.

original: slob dpon shar du bltas slob ma nub tu bltas la /🔽lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis srad bu lte ba nas bzung la dza: zhes brjod la //
analyzed: slob dpon shar du bltas slob ma nub tu bltas la / lag pa gnyis kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis srad bu lte ba nas bzung la dza: zhes brjod la //
translated: The master faces east, the disciple faces west.🔽Holding the thread at the navel with the vajra fists of both hands, one should say jaḥ.

original: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis grogs mchog la gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa rdo rje khu tshur gyis grogs mchog la gtang bar bya'o //
translated: The vajra fist on the left should be released to the excellent friend.

original: grogs pos kyang dza: gsum gyis blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: grogs pos kyang dza: gsum gyis blang bar bya'o //
translated: The friend should also take it with three JAHs.

original: de nas 'debs kar 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas 'debs kar 'di skad brjod par bya ste /
translated: Then, when sprinkling, one should say this:

original: nam mkha' gang ba'i bde gshegs rnams //
analyzed: nam mkha' gang ba'i bde gshegs rnams //
translated: All Sugatas filling space,

original: thig gi sgra yis bskul nas ni //
analyzed: thig gi sgra yis bskul nas ni //
translated: Having been invoked by the sound of the chalk line,

original: thams cad 'dir ni gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: thams cad 'dir ni gshegs su gsol //
translated: All of you, please come here.

original: khyed kyis 'gro don mdzad pa'i rigs //
analyzed: khyed kyis 'gro don mdzad pa'i rigs //
translated: It is fitting that you act for the benefit of beings.

original: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes brjod de //
analyzed: aom badzra sa ma ya s'u tram m'a ti kra ma h'um zhes brjod de //
translated: OM VAJRA SAMAYA SATVA MAHA SUkha KRAMA HUM

original: ji ltar gzhan nas gsungs pa ltar gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gzhan nas gsungs pa ltar gdab par bya'o //
translated: As it is said elsewhere, one should sprinkle.
